name: shed-skin
caption: Shed Skin

effect.short: Has a 33% chance of curing any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.
effect.full: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.

flavorText:
The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions
by shedding its skin.
